modName: Explosive Arrows - Ghost Helm and more
summary:
Various custom items, such as:
Caster Forsworn armor
Sexy/Spooky caster armor
Modified Nightingale Assassin's armor
Exploding arrows! Yes, those!
descriptionHtml:
Arrows:
Daedric Explosive Arrow - xx001DA8 (Large area explosion, 24 points of damage)
Daedric Lightning Arrow - xx002312 (Single-Target lightning arrow, 24 points of damage)
Daedric Freeze Arrow - xx002311 (Single-target paralysis arrow, 24 points of damage)

Nightingale Armor (Modified):
Night Armor - xx000D70
Night Boots - xx000D71
Night Gloves - xx000D73
Night Helm - xx000D75
Night Ring - xx000D77

Sexy/Spooky caster armor:
Ghost's Touch - xx006CDE
Ring of Wolves - xx006CE0
Crown of Corin - xx006CDF (Turns character into a ghost, not marked as undead)
Nocturnal Robes - xx006CE1 (Yes, the incredibly sexy one, not bugged)
Boots of Stalking - xx006CDD
Jewel of Haunting - xx014A41 (Creates an ice cloak)

Forsworn caster armor (Modified):
Helmet of the Homeland - xx02DF4A
Armor of the Homeland - xx02DF48
Boots of the Homeland - xx02DF47
Gauntlets of the Homeland - xx02DF49

** Notes:
1) The ghost effect from the Crown of Corin will PERMANENTLY affect your character, I have not found a fix for this. When removed you become mostly transparent, but still visible to NPCs.
2) The Jewel of Haunting cloak affect is NOT permanent. You can take it off and there is no lingering affect.
3) These arrows are good for distracting NPCs (most will run toward the landing spot) and are MUCH more visible than even Bound arrows.
4) Some of these items are a bit overpowered, so if you're playing on a lower difficulty you may want to increase it.
5) If you are new to the console, the 'xx' in front of the number corresponds to the load order of this mod. It will go from '01'-'09' then to '0A' and up.
6) These arrows ARE affected by the stealth multiplier
7) This is my first custom file and I can't really support it much because I'm just messing around with stuff. Also, I don't THINK you need any expansions....
author: ACorin

files.name: Explosive Arrows - Ghost Helm and more
